mapper.insert: insert into class_obj ( obj_id, user_id, title, url, img, status, ctime values ( #{objId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0)
mapper.select: select obj_id, user_id, title, url, img, status,ctime from class_obj where obj_id = #{objId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status!=1
select bj_id, user_id, title, url, img, status,ctime from class_obj where status!=1
